#summary This page has some numerical benches.

= Introduction =

`Some simple numerical benches that can be used to test improvements with static compilation, and with invoke dynamic mode.`


= Simple Maths =

{{{

tic(); 
sm = 0;
N=100;
M=100;
K=50;
for (k in 1..N) {
 for (m in 1..M) {
  for (r in 1..K) {
   sm += sin(k*m)/sin(r);
   sm = sin(sm-cos(k*m));
   }
 }
}
tm = toc();
